Comment: These should not be framed as "budget cuts" because they're simply taking money from services that benefit all of us, and turning them into tax subsidies for the rich.   If you do that you're not "cutting the budget" because that money isn't going to services, it isn't going to the tax payer. It's redistributing your tax money from things that benefit you into the pocket of rich people.  It's one of the most obvious and transparent scams going and the fact so many working class people fall for it is a tragedy of modern education.
Author: StoppableHulk
